CustomField.description: Field to look up a user record that will 'own' this Prospect record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a user to assign this record to (Sales Managers or Terr. Leaders ONLY).
CustomField.label: Assigned To

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Assigned user must be a Sales Manager or higher level.
lookupFilter.infoMessage: Select a Sales Manager or higher user.
